alert.note: Alert for Dent; Shannon; Texas (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 08 at 7:44PM CDT until May 08 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Shannon County in south central Missouri... Southern Dent County in south central Missouri... Northern Texas County in south central Missouri... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 744 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Fort Leonard Wood to 10 miles east of Salem, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Montauk State Park, Current River State Park, Ozark National Scenic Riverways, Licking, Bunker, Raymondville, Montauk, Turtle, Jadwin, Midridge, Darien, Hazelton, Gladden, Success, Roby, Akers and Prescott. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
